hoamon 的系統公鑰
================================================================================

.. code-block:: ini

    ssh-rsa  rsa-key-20130205
    ssh-rsa  hoamon@X201i
    ssh-rsa  hoamon@Aspire-M1930-U
    ssh-rsa  hoamon@ThinkPad-X230i

put above in .ssh/authorized_keys2

.. categories:: english
.. tags:: ssh
.. comments::
